name: Execution of Renamed PaExec
description: Detects execution of renamed paexec via imphash and executable product string
query: ((process.pe.product:/.*[Pp][Aa][Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc].*/ AND (process.pe.imphash:(/11[Dd]40[Aa]7[Bb]7876288[Ff]919[Aa][Bb]819[Cc][Cc]2[Dd]9802/ OR /6444[Ff]8[Aa]34[Ee]99[Bb]8[Ff]7[Dd]9647[Dd][Ee]66[Aa][Aa][Bb][Ee]516/ OR /[Dd][Ff][Dd]6[Aa][Aa]3[Ff]7[Bb]2[Bb]1035[Bb]76[Bb]718[Ff]1[Dd][Dd][Cc]689[Ff]/ OR /1[Aa]6[Cc][Cc][Aa]4[Dd]5460[Bb]1710[Aa]12[Dd][Ee][Aa]39[Ee]4[Aa]592[Cc]/) OR related.hash:(/.*[Ii][Mm][Pp][Hh][Aa][Ss][Hh]\=11[Dd]40[Aa]7[Bb]7876288[Ff]919[Aa][Bb]819[Cc][Cc]2[Dd]9802.*/ OR /.*[Ii][Mm][Pp][Hh][Aa][Ss][Hh]\=6444[Ff]8[Aa]34[Ee]99[Bb]8[Ff]7[Dd]9647[Dd][Ee]66[Aa][Aa][Bb][Ee]516.*/ OR /.*[Ii][Mm][Pp][Hh][Aa][Ss][Hh]\=[Dd][Ff][Dd]6[Aa][Aa]3[Ff]7[Bb]2[Bb]1035[Bb]76[Bb]718[Ff]1[Dd][Dd][Cc]689[Ff].*/ OR /.*[Ii][Mm][Pp][Hh][Aa][Ss][Hh]\=1[Aa]6[Cc][Cc][Aa]4[Dd]5460[Bb]1710[Aa]12[Dd][Ee][Aa]39[Ee]4[Aa]592[Cc].*/))) AND (NOT (process.executable:/.*[Pp][Aa][Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc].*/)))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.pe.product:*PAExec* AND (process.pe.imphash:(11D40A7B7876288F919AB819CC2D9802 OR 6444f8a34e99b8f7d9647de66aabe516 OR dfd6aa3f7b2b1035b76b718f1ddc689f OR 1a6cca4d5460b1710a12dea39e4a592c) OR related.hash:(*IMPHASH\=11D40A7B7876288F919AB819CC2D9802* OR *IMPHASH\=6444f8a34e99b8f7d9647de66aabe516* OR *IMPHASH\=dfd6aa3f7b2b1035b76b718f1ddc689f* OR *IMPHASH\=1a6cca4d5460b1710a12dea39e4a592c*))) AND (NOT (process.executable:*paexec*)))`
